column4: Hi everyone. When booting lucid lynx, boot time is about 15 secs but then the screen stays black for ~20 secs before displaying anything, only the mouse pointer is visible. Is that normal or a bug? THANKS, Andy
Does anybody have a clue? Is it normal for the screen to stay black for another 20secs after having booted for ~15secs?
Anybody else experiencing the screen staying black for 20 secs after finishing booting with only the mouse cursor visible?
